snippet: The 17-year-old being held in three killings at an Ohio high school had a troubled past.
abstract: T J Lane, teenager being held in a school shooting rampage in Cleveland, Ohio, had a troubled past, including 2009 assault accusations and juvenile detention for his acts; court documents also show that Lane came from a broken home in which both his parents filed domestic assault charges against each other.

byline.original: By SABRINA TAVERNISE and JENNIFER PRESTON
byline.contributor: Sabrina Tavernise reported from Chardon, and Jennifer Preston from New York.

lead_paragraph: The 17-year-old being held in three killings at an Ohio high school had a troubled past.

headline.main: School Shooting Suspect Was Accused of Earlier Assault
headline.print_headline: School Shooting Suspect Was Accused of Earlier Assault
